Lecture: Introduction & Patterns of diversity in the fossil record

Jan 9, 2018

For this lecture, we will be introducing you to the course material and what we will cover this semester. Then, there will be a lecture on the paleontological perspective of macroevolution. To prepare for class, please read Benton (2015). A PDF of this paper can be found on the Canvas site.


Hosted by GitHub.
